snippet: Although she is more of a skiing or walking, reflective sort, the author gets a thrill barreling along on a snowmobile -- until the muscle aches set in.
abstract: Although she is more of a skiing or walking, reflective sort, the author gets a thrill barreling along on a snowmobile -- until the muscle aches set in.
lead_paragraph: Our family, including three boys ages 8, 10 and 11 and two cats, is seven months into our year in the woods, and at long last we are snowbound. We've been waiting for this since October! Our local friends have been assuring us, "Once it starts, it won't let up - and you'll be wishing it would," but so far this has not been the case. We have a decent 10 inches on the ground, but it's been days since we had a top-up.
